DOC.brief_summary: The study will identify healthy adults who have been vaccinated against pneumococcus, and collect blood for the purpose of developing laboratory assays.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Serum Collected From Healthy Adults For Development of Pneumococcal Opsonophagocytic Assay
DOC.detailed_description: Collect serum with antibody levels capable of killing pneumococcal bacteria from healthy prevaccinated adults to develop OPA assays for the 13 serotypes in 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine.
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults 1870 years of age Must have received 23vPS pneumococcal vaccine Bleeding diathesis Pregnancy Chronic disease which could be worsened by donating blood Receipt of blood, blood products or immune globulin within six months
